metadata.title: CVE-2021-25263 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Clickhouse prior to versions v20.8.18.32-lts, v21.1.9.41-stable, v21.2.9.41-stable, v21.3.6.55-lts, v21.4.3.21-stable allows user to read any file on the host system, that clickhouse user has access to.

criterions.comment: clickhouse package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
